text:
get a true observation at the end of the week or we do and choose to not re-ﬁt the model, this
would be a static model. We may prefer a dynamic model, but the constraints of the domain or
limitations of a chosen algorithm may impose constraints that make this intractable.
 Static. A forecast model is ﬁt once and used to make predictions.
 Dynamic. A forecast model is ﬁt on newly available data prior to each prediction.
Do you require a static or a dynamically updated model?
